snippet.title: Marinated Cornish Game Hens With Sweet Chili Sauce
snippet.description: Sounds different with an Asian flavor. From the 1995 Pingry School Cookbook. Submitted by the Welch Family.

snippet.title: Thai-curried Game Hens
snippet.description: i love thai food and i love cornish hens. you must try this if you do too.

snippet.title: Possum Chili (1995 Ca. Dept. of Fish & Game Chili Contest)
snippet.description: This recipe, submitted for our annual (at that time) Chili Cookoff Contest, was the winner!

snippet.title: Grilled Cornish Game Hens
snippet.description: I came across this recipe while looking for grilling recipes that are interesting and a bit different from the ordinary. Prep time includes 12 hour marinating...

snippet.title: Barbecued Vietnamese 5-Spice Cornish Game Hens
snippet.description: The Winning Recipe for 1990 in the San Francisco Chronicle, by Joyce Jue.
